1.long: brotherly love, love of Christian brethren.
I remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await.

2.long: (a) gen: through, throughout, by the instrumentality of, (b) acc: through, on account of, by reason of, for the sake of, because of.
I am hidden (concealed), lie hid, escape notice, sometimes with acc. of person from whom concealment takes place; I do so and so unconsciously, unknown to myself, I shut my eyes to so and so.
any one, some one, a certain one or thing.

2.brief: I entertain a stranger, I startle
2.long: (a) I entertain a stranger, (b) I startle, bewilder.
a messenger, generally a (supernatural) messenger from God, an angel, conveying news or behests from God to men.

3.long: I remember, call to mind, recall, mention.

3.brief: as, like as, how, while, so that
3.long: as, like as, about, as it were, according as, how, when, while, as soon as, so that.
I bind together; pass: I am bound together with, as of prisoners in chains.

3.brief: as, like as, how, while, so that
3.long: as, like as, about, as it were, according as, how, when, while, as soon as, so that.

3.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
3.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
body, flesh; the body of the Church.

4.long: a marriage, wedding, wedding-ceremony; plur: a wedding-feast.

4.brief: all, the whole, every kind of
4.long: all, the whole, every kind of.
(a) a bed, (b) a marriage bed; plur: repeated (immoral) sexual intercourse.
a fornicator, man who prostitutes himself.
an adulterer, that is, a man who is guilty with a married woman.
(a) I judge, whether in a law-court or privately: sometimes with cognate nouns emphasizing the notion of the verb, (b) I decide, I think (it) good.

5.long: (a) way, manner, (b) manner of life, character.

5.brief: I am sufficient, I suffice, am content, satisfied
5.long: I keep off, assist; I suffice; pass: I am satisfied.
I am present, am near; I have come, arrived.

5.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
5.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

5.brief: I let go, loosen, release, give up, neglect
5.long: I send up, produce, send back; I let go; I relax, loosen, hence met: I give up, desist from.
neither, nor, not even, and not.
I leave in the lurch, abandon (one who is in straits), desert.

6.long: so that, therefore, so then, so as to.

6.brief: I am courageous, of good cheer
6.long: I am courageous, confident, of good cheer.
(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
I fear, dread, reverence, am afraid, terrified.
(a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause.

6.brief: a man, one of the human race
6.long: a man, one of the human race.

7.long: I remember, hold in remembrance, make mention of.
(a) I lead, (b) I think, am of opinion, suppose, consider.
(I talk, chatter in classical Greek, but in NT a more dignified word) I speak, say.

7.brief: a word, speech, divine utterance, analogy
7.long: a word, speech, divine utterance, analogy.
I look at attentively, gaze at, consider.
(a) a way out, escape, (b) result, issue.
dealing with other men, conduct, life, behavior, manner of life.
faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

8.long: Jesus; the Greek form of Joshua; Jesus, son of Eliezer; Jesus, surnamed Justus.

8.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
8.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
into, in, unto, to, upon, towards, for, among.

8.brief: an age, a cycle of time
8.long: an age, a cycle (of time), especially of the present age as contrasted with the future age, and of one of a series of ages stretching to infinity.

9.long: various, of different colors, diverse, various.
alien, new, novel; noun: a guest, stranger, foreigner.

9.brief: I turn aside, carry away, remove
9.long: I turn aside, carry away, remove, cause to pass away; pass: I am misled, seduced.
beautiful, as an outward sign of the inward good, noble, honorable character; good, worthy, honorable, noble, and seen to be so.
(a) grace, as a gift or blessing brought to man by Jesus Christ, (b) favor, (c) gratitude, thanks, (d) a favor, kindness.
I confirm, ratify, secure, establish; pass: I guarantee.
lit: the heart; mind, character, inner self, will, intention, center.
I help, benefit, do good, am useful (to), profit.
I walk, hence Hebraistically (in an ethical sense): I conduct my life, live.

10.brief: from out, out from among, from
10.long: from out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards.
I eat, partake of food; met: I devour, consume (e.g. as rust does); used only in fut. and 2nd aor. tenses.
(a) power, authority, weight, especially: moral authority, influence, (b) in a quasi-personal sense, derived from later Judaism, of a spiritual power, and hence of an earthly power.
a tent, booth, tabernacle, abode, dwelling, mansion, habitation.
I serve, especially God, perhaps simply: I worship.

11.long: I lead into, bring in, announce.
prop: missing the mark; hence: (a) guilt, sin, (b) a fault, failure (in an ethical sense), sinful deed.
into, in, unto, to, upon, towards, for, among.
set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred.
(a) gen: through, throughout, by the instrumentality of, (b) acc: through, on account of, by reason of, for the sake of, because of.
body, flesh; the body of the Church.

11.brief: a camp, barracks, army in battle array
11.long: a camp, fort, castle, barracks, army in battle array.

12.long: Jesus; the Greek form of Joshua; Jesus, son of Eliezer; Jesus, surnamed Justus.
I make holy, treat as holy, set apart as holy, sanctify, hallow, purify.
(a) gen: through, throughout, by the instrumentality of, (b) acc: through, on account of, by reason of, for the sake of, because of.
one's own, belonging to one, private, personal; one's own people, one's own family, home, property.
(a) a people, characteristically of God's chosen people, first the Jews, then the Christians, (b) sometimes, but rarely, the people, the crowd.
I am acted upon in a certain way, either good or bad; I experience ill treatment, suffer.

13.long: indeed now, therefore, accordingly, well then.

13.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
13.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.

13.brief: a camp, barracks, army in battle array
13.long: a camp, fort, castle, barracks, army in battle array.

13.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
13.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
I carry, bear, bring; I conduct, lead; perhaps: I make publicly known.

14.long: here, the things here, what is here, what is going on here, the state of affairs here.
I remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await.
a city, the inhabitants of a city.
I intend, am about to; I delay, linger.

14.brief: I seek after, desire, search for
14.long: I seek after, desire, search for, make inquiries about.

15.long: (a) gen: through, throughout, by the instrumentality of, (b) acc: through, on account of, by reason of, for the sake of, because of.

15.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
15.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.

15.brief: I carry up, lead up, offer up
15.long: (a) I carry up, lead up, (b) I offer up (on a high altar) as a sacrifice, offer up to God on high.
abstr. and concr: sacrifice; a sacrifice, offering.
(a) gen: through, throughout, by the instrumentality of, (b) acc: through, on account of, by reason of, for the sake of, because of.

15.brief: all, the whole, every kind of
15.long: all, the whole, every kind of.
(a) fruit, generally vegetable, sometimes animal, (b) met: fruit, deed, action, result, (c) profit, gain.
a lip, mouth, shore, edge, brink; meton: language, dialect.
(a) I promise, agree, (b) I confess, (c) I publicly declare, (d) a Hebraism, I praise, celebrate.

15.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
15.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.

16.brief: but, on the other hand, and
16.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
(lit: partnership) (a) contributory help, participation, (b) sharing in, communion, (c) spiritual fellowship, a fellowship in the spirit.
abstr. and concr: sacrifice; a sacrifice, offering.
I give pleasure to, please (perhaps with the added idea of: rendering good service to).

17.long: (a) I lead, (b) I think, am of opinion, suppose, consider.

17.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
17.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
I am not asleep, am awake; especially: I am watchful, careful.
gen: in behalf of; acc: above.
(a) the vital breath, breath of life, (b) the human soul, (c) the soul as the seat of affections and will, (d) the self, (e) a human person, an individual.

17.brief: as, like as, how, while, so that
17.long: as, like as, about, as it were, according as, how, when, while, as soon as, so that.

17.brief: a word, speech, divine utterance, analogy
17.long: a word, speech, divine utterance, analogy.
(a) I give back, return, restore, (b) I give, render, as due, (c) mid: I sell.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
joy, gladness, a source of joy.
(a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause.
I groan, expressing grief, anger, or desire.

18.long: I pray, pray for, offer prayer.
that, since, because; may introduce direct discourse.
beautiful, as an outward sign of the inward good, noble, honorable character; good, worthy, honorable, noble, and seen to be so.

18.brief: all, the whole, every kind of
18.long: all, the whole, every kind of.
I will, wish, desire, am willing, intend, design.

18.brief: I overturn, turn upside down, return, mid. and pass: I conduct myself, live
18.long: I overturn; I turn back, return; I turn hither and thither; pass: I turn myself about; I sojourn, dwell; I conduct myself, behave, live.

19.brief: but, on the other hand, and
19.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
(a) I send for, summon, invite, (b) I beseech, entreat, beg, (c) I exhort, admonish, (d) I comfort, encourage, console.
(a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause.
I set up again, restore to its original position or condition; hence: I restore, give back.

20.brief: but, on the other hand, and
20.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
peace, peace of mind; invocation of peace a common Jewish farewell, in the Hebraistic sense of the health (welfare) of an individual.

20.brief: I lead up, put to sea, set sail
20.long: I lead up, bring up, offer, produce, put to sea, set sail.

20.brief: from out, out from among, from
20.long: from out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards.
(a) adj: dead, lifeless, subject to death, mortal, (b) noun: a dead body, a corpse.
a shepherd; hence met: of the feeder, protector, and ruler of a flock of men.
large, great, in the widest sense.

age-long, and therefore: practically eternal, unending; partaking of the character of that which lasts for an age, as contrasted with that which is brief and fleeting.
Jesus; the Greek form of Joshua; Jesus, son of Eliezer; Jesus, surnamed Justus.

21.long: (a) I fit (join) together; met: I compact together, (b) act. and mid: I prepare, perfect, for his (its) full destination or use, bring into its proper condition (whether for the first time, or after a lapse).
you.
in, on, among.

21.long: all, the whole, every kind of.

into, in, unto, to, upon, towards, for, among.
the, the definite article.

the, the definite article.

the, the definite article.

who, which, what, that.

21.brief: an age, a cycle of time
21.long: an age, a cycle (of time), especially of the present age as contrasted with the future age, and of one of a series of ages stretching to infinity.

21.long: an age, a cycle (of time), especially of the present age as contrasted with the future age, and of one of a series of ages stretching to infinity.

21.brief: verily, truly, amen, so let it be
21.long: verily, truly, amen; at the end of sentences may be paraphrased by: So let it be.

22.long: (a) I send for, summon, invite, (b) I beseech, entreat, beg, (c) I exhort, admonish, (d) I comfort, encourage, console.

22.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.
a brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian.

23.long: I am taking in knowledge, come to know, learn; aor: I ascertained, realized.
